name: iMath
author: ANTs Developers
description: iMath is a tool for performing various image mathematical operations on medical images, specifically supporting operations on 2D, 3D, and 4D data.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: Dimensionality of the image, either 2, 3, or 4.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: Path for the output image file.

inputs.name: Operations
inputs.description: Operations to be performed along with parameters, e.g., GetLargestComponent, MC for Closing, etc.

inputs.name: Input Image 2
inputs.description: Second input image file, if required by operation.

groups.name: Get Largest Component
groups.description: Get the single largest labeled object in an image.

groups.name: Morphological Operations
groups.description: Perform morphological operations such as closing, dilation, etc.

output-files.name: Resulting Image
output-files.description: The output image resulting from the operation.
